heif.boxes

Class ItemProtectionBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemProtectionBox

  • public class ItemProtectionBox
extends FullBox
    This derived Box class handles the Box identified as ipro - Item Protection Box. For technical details, refer to the Specification document - ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, on page 80.
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ItemProtectionBox(Box box, SequentialByteReader reader)
      This constructor creates a derived Box object, providing an array of item protection information, for use by the Item Information Box.
